original: du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: du 'gyur ro //
translated: Having made a rope from cow's hair, having enchanted it seven times, whoever's neck it is bound around will become a cow.

original: de ltar sems can gyi ske la bcings par 'gyur ba de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sems can gyi ske la bcings par 'gyur ba de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: so ba la mngon par sngags te so ba'i bdag po'i khyim du gtor nas lhag mas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having enchanted barley, having scattered it in the house of the barley owner, with the remainder one should consecrate oneself.

analyzed: nyin zhag bdun gyi so ba thams cad dang / nor gzhan kun 'gugs par 'gyur ro //

original: bcom ldan 'das ma'i snying po'i yi ge drug pa zlos shing rkang rjes kyi rdul dang / thal bar bcas pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas gang la byugs pa de rgyas btab par 'gyur ro //
